summary_comment: The professor is inconsistent in preparation and delivery, often leading to unengaging and confusing classes. Students find the material challenging without clear guidance, and some have noted inappropriate comments that make them feel inferior. Despite this, consistent effort can lead to satisfactory grades.

Ratings.comment: I only had this class one day/week. The class was extremely boring, and sometimes he wasn't prepared or would ramble on and be confusing. He also occasionally made inappropriate comments and made students feel inferior. Overall, if you do the work, you'll get a good grade in the class.
Some days he wasnt prepared to teach. Very confusing sometimes. Be ready work work hard and show up to class.

summary_comment: The professor is known for delivering straightforward and clear PowerPoint presentations, which compensate for the occasionally boring lectures. Despite her accent making understanding her at times challenging, students appreciate the abundance of extra credit opportunities and the low likelihood of receiving grades below an A. The assessment structure includes two midterms, one paper, a final exam, and mandatory attendance.

Ratings.comment: This class was super easy even though the lectures are very boring. Understanding her might be difficult at times due to her accent but her powerpoints are clear and easy. Hands out a TON of extra credit, you'd have to work hard to get below an A. 2 Midterms, 1 Paper, Final and attendance.
